item.name: 1960: The Making of the President
item.comment: Very nice 2-players game if you are into the theme. Unfortunately it doesn't hit the table so often after Twilight struggle Deluxe was acquired.

item.name: Ants!
item.comment: Nice, lighter themed, nexus ops style game.

item.name: Arkham Horror: Curse of the Dark Pharaoh Expansion
Betrayal at House on the Hill
Bohnanza
item.comment: When playing it with the orders addition from high bohn and the extra beans and mafia cards and 2-player rules from Al Cabohne makes it the perfect light game (not a filler since it often takes more than an hour) for me and my girlfriend. The only game she never says no when proposed for a play.
